languages.text: "Выполню ваш приказ по поиску маршала, разумеется. А после... я вас покину. Надолго или нет, только Император ведает — сейчас каждый арбитр на счету, и я нужен на Даргонусе".
"I will follow your orders to find a new Marshal, of course. And after that... I will leave you. For how long, only the Emperor knows — every Arbitrator counts now, and I'm needed on Dargonus."
languages.original_text: "Выполню ваш приказ по поиску маршала, разумеется. А после... я вас покину. Надолго или нет, только Император ведает — сейчас каждый арбитр на счету, и я нужен на Даргонусе".

traits.locale_text: "I will follow your orders to find the Marshal, of course. And after that... I will leave you. For how long, only the Emperor knows — every Arbitrator counts now, and I'm needed on Dargonus."
"I will follow your orders to find the Marshal, of course. And after that... I will leave you. For how long, only the Emperor knows — every Arbitrator counts now, and I'm needed on Dargonus."
"I will follow your orders to find the Marshal, of course. And after that... I will leave you. For how long, only the Emperor knows — every Arbitrator counts now, and I'm needed on Dargonus."
"I will follow your orders to find a new Marshal, of course. And after that... I will leave you. For how long, only the Emperor knows — every Arbitrator counts now, and I'm needed on Dargonus."
"I will follow your orders to find a new Marshal, of course. And after that... I will leave you. For how long, only the Emperor knows — every Arbitrator counts now, and I'm needed on Dargonus."

languages.text: 「もちろん、新たな将帥を探すというご命令には従います。その後は…あなたのもとを去ります。どれくらいの間かは、神帝陛下のみがご存じです。今やアービトレイターは1人でも貴重です。私はダルゴナスで必要とされているのです」
languages.original_text: "I will follow your orders to find a new Marshal, of course. And after that... I will leave you. For how long, only the Emperor knows — every Arbitrator counts now, and I'm needed on Dargonus."

traits.locale_text: 「もちろん、新たな将帥を探すというご命令には従います。その後は…あなたのもとを去ります。どれくらいの間かは、神帝陛下のみがご存じです。今やアービトレイターは1人でも貴重です。私はダルゴナスで必要とされているのです」

languages.text: "Ich werde natürlich Euren Befehlen folgen und einen neuen Marschall finden. Und danach ... werde ich Euch verlassen. Für wie lange, weiß nur der Imperator – jeder Arbitrator zählt jetzt, und ich werde auf Dargonus gebraucht."
languages.original_text: "I will follow your orders to find a new Marshal, of course. And after that... I will leave you. For how long, only the Emperor knows — every Arbitrator counts now, and I'm needed on Dargonus."

traits.locale_text: "Ich werde natürlich Euren Befehlen folgen und einen neuen Marschall finden. Und danach ... werde ich Euch verlassen. Für wie lange, weiß nur der Imperator – jeder Arbitrator zählt jetzt, und ich werde auf Dargonus gebraucht."

languages.text: « Je suivrai vos ordres et partirai à la recherche d'un nouveau maréchal, évidemment. Et après... Je devrai vous quitter. Pour combien de temps, seul l'Empereur-Dieu le sait. Chaque arbitrator compte désormais et ma présence est requise sur Dargonus. »
languages.original_text: "I will follow your orders to find a new Marshal, of course. And after that... I will leave you. For how long, only the Emperor knows — every Arbitrator counts now, and I'm needed on Dargonus."

traits.locale_text: « Je suivrai vos ordres et partirai à la recherche d'un nouveau maréchal, évidemment. Et après... Je devrai vous quitter. Pour combien de temps, seul l'Empereur-Dieu le sait. Chaque arbitrator compte désormais et ma présence est requise sur Dargonus. »

languages.text: «Cumpliré su orden de buscar un nuevo mariscal, claro está. Y después de eso... me marcharé. Solo el Emperador sabe cuánto tiempo estaré ausente; hacen falta Arbitrator, y me necesitan en Dargonus».
languages.original_text: "I will follow your orders to find a new Marshal, of course. And after that... I will leave you. For how long, only the Emperor knows — every Arbitrator counts now, and I'm needed on Dargonus."

traits.locale_text: «Cumpliré su orden de buscar un nuevo mariscal, claro está. Y después de eso... me marcharé. Solo el Emperador sabe cuánto tiempo estaré ausente; hacen falta Arbitrator, y me necesitan en Dargonus».

languages.text: “我会遵从你的命令，找人填补元帅的空缺，毫无疑问。在那之后……我要离开你的身边。至于离开多久，恐怕只有帝皇才知道。这种时候，每位法务官都非常重要，达戈努斯需要我。”
languages.original_text: "I will follow your orders to find a new Marshal, of course. And after that... I will leave you. For how long, only the Emperor knows — every Arbitrator counts now, and I'm needed on Dargonus."

traits.locale_text: “我会遵从你的命令，找人填补元帅的空缺，毫无疑问。在那之后……我要离开你的身边。至于离开多久，恐怕只有帝皇才知道。这种时候，每位法务官都非常重要，达戈努斯需要我。”

languages.text: "Elbette yeni bir Miralay bulma emrini uygulayacağım. Sonra da... Ayrılıp gideceğim. Ne kadar süre yanında kalacağımı yalnızca İmparator bilir. Artık her Yargıcı'nın önemi büyük, Dargonus'un da bana ihtiyacı var."
languages.original_text: "I will follow your orders to find a new Marshal, of course. And after that... I will leave you. For how long, only the Emperor knows — every Arbitrator counts now, and I'm needed on Dargonus."

traits.locale_text: "Elbette yeni bir Miralay bulmak adına senin emirlerini uygulayacağım. Ondan sonra da... Seni terk edeceğim. Ne kadar süre yanında kalırım, yalnızca İmparator bilir. Artık her Yargıcı'nın önemi büyük ve Dargonus'un bana ihtiyacı var."
